title: React useTitle Hook
description: In this lab, we will learn how to use the useTitle hook in React to dynamically set the title of a web page. This hook is useful when building web applications that require changing the page title dynamically based on the content being displayed. Through this lab, we will explore how to implement the useTitle hook and use it in a practical example.

meta.title: Mastering the useTitle Hook in React
meta.description: Learn how to use the useTitle hook to dynamically set the page title in your React applications.
meta.keywords: hook, react, usetitle, dynamic title, web development
